title: Ping Spikes 7/25/16
body:
Another Problem :D 
go from 68 ping to 86 then down then up tops out at 300

any explanation riot? 
In Minnesota and its been like 5 months sense my ping has been normal..... (39)....
Miss playing this game, its just sad this problem has gone on this long....

replies.body: yeah it sucks man, but when a problem exists for this long it is quite clear the parties involve have no interest in fixing it.

*Explanation incoming!* Often times when there is a dramatic rise in latency, it's caused by how the ISP routes traffic to that specific server or service. There are also some local network configurations that can add to this issue, so it's a good idea to ensure your settings are compatible with League by using our [connection guide. ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Should you still have issues after working through that guide, let me know!

We in Minnesota were told we are not being routed to the correct sever and im being routed somewhere else then back to Chicago. 
I have done all i could on my end and on my other forms where told to run all these test.
Nothing has help and I was told that Riot was trying to get the Chicago server routing issue correct soon. Had this problem sense 6.6 :/
Any other help or ideas?

If the connection guide caused no change, then we'll need to investigate into your route to the server before you reach out to your ISP. I recommend [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with our tech specialists.

If you attach a set of [traceroutes](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs#wq2) and system logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs), our techs will have the info needed to take a deeper look at this. Let me know if you have any questions.

Ive tried... I still have all the logs and emails from the fizz guy i emailed 
:/ he just told me pretty much O WELL its not our fault and I  submitted another ticket and it came back saying my problems was already solved.... 

IDK what else to do.... i just miss my low ping... anyother game i play its 34 ping but on this game is like is all jumpy and glitchy at 70ping. 

I dont know... I know its not your fault im just so let down and confused on what else I can do. :(
Can you provide me your ticket number so I can look into this for you?

#21698428 that should be it and then its said it was finished so i never got to email back saying it was not fixed. 

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/21698428
It seems you had some issues on your ISP's infrastructure. Were you ever able to work with your ISP's tier 2 support to get that fixed?

um my ISP came out looked at everything and nothing was changed after months of talking to you guys it magically got better from your end.

I was told by my ISP that the server i was connecting too would bounce the code else where. 

Tier 2?

Tier 2 means the second person you're escalated to when you call in. The first person you speak with is most often going to be a tier 1 agent. Tiers generally refer to the complexity of the issues that person can handle and the tech knowledge that person has.

If you'd like, you can run a set of traceroutes using [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net) so I can take a look at your route to the server. Run a trace for 5 minutes using 104.160.131.1 as the IP address. After it has run for 5 minutes, export the results as text and paste them here. Not to worry, your real IP address isn't listed on the log, so no security risks here.
